name: Zoom - The Size Shifter
description:
Zoom – The Size Shifter is a platformer, adventure, single player game with multiple levels. The player will get to control Zoom, a spy who have the power to change his size depend on the environment in order to infiltrate the enemy lair and get intel for a secret agency. .

The player need to control Zoom and use his skill wisely to get over the obstacles on the way and find the exit door. The obstacles will be classified to fit Zoom's forms.
